channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: House Republicans divided over Obamacare as GOP eyes fix after shutdown
item.description: Speaker Mike Johnson is eyeing a healthcare package as GOP factions feud over how to handle expiring Obamacare credits after the shutdown.

item.title: Humility Revisited: On Being Conservative

item.title: These dinosaur bones have stumped scientists since the 1940s. New evidence claims to solve the mystery
item.description: Scientists have long puzzled over the origins of a mysterious dinosaur excavated in the 1940s: Was it a young T. rex or another type of dinosaur?

item.title: 6 Attorneys Who Signed Arctic Frost Subpoenas Are No Longer At DOJ
item.description: All of the six attorneys who signed the subpoenas released Wednesday are no longer employed by the DOJ, The Federalist has learned.

item.title: China’s ‘Fortress Without Isolation’

item.title: NATO Member’s Top Court Considers Whether Saying Men And Women Are Different Is A War Crime
